author: Vonng (rh@vonng.com)
description: PostgreSQL Catalog Explorer for Single Instance

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  key, to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS value FROM pigsty.global_config WHERE key
    in ('admin_ip', 'version', 'region');

SELECT d.key                  AS name,
       d.value ->> 'domain'   AS domain,
       replace(d.value ->> 'endpoint', '${admin_ip}', pigsty.get_param('admin_ip') ) AS endpoint
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_each(v.value) d
WHERE v.key = 'infra_portal';
SELECT cls FROM pigsty.group

SELECT key AS ip, (value ->> 'infra_seq')::INTEGER AS infra_seq, 
       'infra-' || (value ->> 'infra_seq') AS name
FROM pigsty.group_config gc, jsonb_each(gc.hosts)
WHERE cls = 'infra';
SELECT seq, ip, ins FROM pigsty.etcd_instance;

SELECT  key, to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS value FROM pigsty.global_config WHERE key
    in ('nginx_port', 'nginx_sslmode', 'nginx_home', 'nginx_port', 'nginx_ssl_port', 'repo_name');

WITH portals AS (SELECT d.key                  AS name,
                        d.value ->> 'domain'   AS domain,
                        d.value ->> 'endpoint' AS endpoint
                 FROM pigsty.global_config v,
                      jsonb_each(v.value) d
                 WHERE v.key = 'infra_portal'),
     navbar AS (SELECT d ->> 'name'    AS name,
                       d ->> 'url'     AS domain,
                       d ->> 'comment' AS comment
                FROM pigsty.global_config v,
                     jsonb_array_elements(v.value) d
                WHERE v.key = 'nginx_navbar')
SELECT name,comment,case
   when starts_with(domain, '/') THEN (SELECT 'http://' || domain FROM portals WHERE name = 'home' LIMIT 1) || domain
   ELSE replace(domain, '${grafana}', (SELECT 'http://' || domain FROM portals WHERE name = 'grafana' LIMIT 1)) END AS url
FROM navbar;

SELECT  key, to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS value FROM pigsty.global_config WHERE key
    in ('node_repo_modules', 'node_repo_remove');

SELECT d ->> 'name'        AS name,
       d ->> 'module'      AS module,
       d -> 'releases'     AS releases,
       d ->> 'description' AS description,
       d -> 'baseurl'      AS baseurl
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements(v.value) d
WHERE v.key = 'repo_upstream';

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'repo_packages'
UNION ALL
SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'repo_url_packages';

WITH ver AS (SELECT  to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "version" FROM pigsty.global_config WHERE key = 'pg_version' LIMIT 1)
SELECT replace(pkg, '${pg_version}' , (SELECT version FROM ver LIMIT 1))
FROM pigsty.global_config v, jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'pg_packages'
UNION ALL
SELECT replace(pkg, '${pg_version}' , (SELECT version FROM ver LIMIT 1))
FROM pigsty.global_config v, jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'pg_extensions'

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_default_packages'
UNION ALL
SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_packages';

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'infra_packages'
UNION ALL
SELECT to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "DCS Type" FROM pigsty.global_config WHERE key = 'infra_packages_pip';
SELECT  to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "DNS Enabled" FROM pigsty.global_config WHERE key = 'dns_enabled';

SELECT replace(record, '${admin_ip}', pigsty.get_param('admin_ip'))
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) record
WHERE v.key = 'node_dns_options'
UNION ALL
SELECT replace(record, '${admin_ip}', pigsty.get_param('admin_ip'))
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) record
WHERE v.key = 'node_dns_servers';

SELECT replace(record, '${admin_ip}', pigsty.get_param('admin_ip'))
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) record
WHERE v.key = 'node_default_etc_hosts'
UNION ALL
SELECT replace(record, '${admin_ip}', pigsty.get_param('admin_ip'))
FROM pigsty.global_config v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) record
WHERE v.key = 'node_etc_hosts';
SELECT  to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "Node DNS Method" FROM pigsty.global_config WHERE key = 'node_dns_method';
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_cluster
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_instance
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_service;
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_database;
SELECT * FROM pigsty.redis_cluster
SELECT * FROM pigsty.redis_node;
SELECT * FROM pigsty.redis_instance
SELECT * FROM pigsty.gp_cluster
SELECT * FROM pigsty.gp_node;
SELECT * FROM pigsty.gp_instance;

title: CMDB Overview
